name: Midnight Moon 🌑
description:
This is 'Midnight Moon'. You play as a cat, nick named "Calypso", who is desperately trying to survive an abandoned environment. Navigate the terrain in search of food whilst avoiding Predators attempting to make you a meal of their own. The further you explore the more difficult the puzzles, enemies, and experience becomes.

(This is a playtest/prototype meant simply to test the basic mechanics. As I continue to work on this project more playtests will be released featuring more levels, enemies, and gameplay elements. Once I have a full build I will release it on Steam and create more Add-ons.)
